hero.title: MoonRise's presale funds infrastructure. Not speculation.
hero.description: The MNR token is distributed directly via smart contract, validated on a public network, with well-defined phases and automatic delivery. This is not a gamble. It's a construction.

network.title: Why are we on BNB Chain?
network.description1: MoonRise is developing its own blockchain ‚Äî MoonChain. But at this stage, we use BNB Chain for a clear reason: security, stability, and efficiency. It ensures low fees, instant execution, and broad compatibility for investors.
network.description2: Once MoonChain is complete, the entire ecosystem will be migrated to our own infrastructure.

structure.title: How does the presale work?
structure.phases: 3 phases with fixed prices and defined limits

purpose.title: Why does this exist?

utility.title: MNR Token Utility
